ygData.subject: RE: Shining Star of Light
ygData.msgSnippet: The SSOL doesn t need to be charged unless you actually click on the weapon to cleanse yourself.  It will cast Cleanse on you occasionally during battle.  This
ygData.messageBody:
The SSOL doesn't need to be charged unless you actually click on the weapon
to cleanse yourself. It will cast Cleanse on you occasionally during
battle. This is unlimited.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeff Habermann [mailto:jrhabermann@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 4:33 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Shining Star of Light


From: Jeff Habermann <jrhabermann@...>

Well, it took me 2 trys, but i finally got the SSOL. The first time the guy
tried to attack me, even though i ran there with SoW. I think however that
somone started the quest, but never finished it. So the guy took it out on
me. :) When i got the SSoL the guy told me to talk to Whysia in the Temple
Store House about recharging it. Where is this Temple Store House? Anyway
I just wanted to say thanks for all the previous help.
